F6O1.F.summary: FLSmidth & Co. A/S provides engineering, equipment, and service solutions for mining and cement industries in North America, South America, Europe, North Africa, Russia, Asia, Sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East, subcontinental India, and Australia. The company offers various products, systems, and services, including crushers, ball mills, pumps, gravity concentrators, thickeners, flotation cells, automated laboratories, bundled equipment, full production plants, and maintenance solutions for the mining industry. It also provides mills, kiln systems and clinker coolers, feeding and packaging machines, complete cement plants, maintenance, and remote online support for the cement industry. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Valby, Denmark.

FLIDY.summary: FLSmidth & Co. A/S provides engineering, equipment, and service solutions for mining and cement industries in North America, South America, Europe, North Africa, Russia, Asia, Sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East, subcontinental India, and Australia. The company offers various products, systems, and services, including crushers, ball mills, pumps, gravity concentrators, thickeners, flotation cells, automated laboratories, bundled equipment, full production plants, and maintenance solutions for the mining industry. It also provides mills, kiln systems and clinker coolers, feeding and packaging machines, complete cement plants, maintenance, and remote online support for the cement industry. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Valby, Denmark.

FLS.CO.summary: FLSmidth & Co. A/S provides engineering, equipment, and service solutions for mining and cement industries in North America, South America, Europe, North Africa, Russia, Asia, Sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East, subcontinental India, and Australia. The company offers various products, systems, and services, including crushers, ball mills, pumps, gravity concentrators, thickeners, flotation cells, automated laboratories, bundled equipment, full production plants, and maintenance solutions for the mining industry. It also provides mills, kiln systems and clinker coolers, feeding and packaging machines, complete cement plants, maintenance, and remote online support for the cement industry. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Valby, Denmark.

FOM.CO.summary: Fom Technologies A/S produces and sells slot die machines and equipment. The company provides roll and sheet based slot-die coating machines that enables researchers, scientists, and professionals to discover, develop, and commercialize new functional materials. The company also offers slot die heads that provide access to a coating platform for a range of thin film applications. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

GJ.CO.summary: Glunz & Jensen Holding A/S develops, produces, and supplies solutions for the prepress industry worldwide. It offers offset products, such as processors, iCtP plate writers, offset prepress products, and plateline products; and flexo products, including all-in-one systems, exposure units, processors, finishers and dryers, trimmers and mounting tables, letterpresses, and other flexo products. The company also provides spare parts kits; iCtP consumables and accessories; offset accessories; and flexo accessories, as well as after sales services. It markets its products through a network of distributors and dealers. The company was formerly known as Glunz & Jensen A/S and changed its name to Glunz & Jensen Holding A/S in December 2016. Glunz & Jensen Holding A/S was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Nyborg, Denmark.

HYDRCT.CO.summary: Hydract A/S develops water hydraulic solutions for the beverage producers. Its solutions simplify the processes and tackle the climate challenges by reducing the need for electricity and water. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Holstebro, Denmark.

KLEE-B.CO.summary: Brd. Klee A/S operates as an engineering and trading company in Denmark. Its products include gears and gearmotors; motors, pumps, and blowers; control and electronic products; pneumatic and hydraulic products; linear motion technology products; transmission products; machine, DIN, and norm parts; and rubber and plastic products. The company was founded in 1944 and is based in Albertslund, Denmark.

NF1.F.summary: Nilfisk Holding A/S manufactures and sells cleaning solutions and services worldwide. The company operates through five segments: EMEA, Americas, APAC, Consumer, and Private Label and Other. It offers commercial and industrial vacuum cleaners; floor cleaning products, including single-disc, burnishers, carpet extractors, scrubber dryers, steam cleaners, sweepers, and combination machines; mobile, stationary, and petrol/diesel driven pressure washers; and industry, vehicle, floor care, surface, and textile detergents, as well as care and maintenance products, and disinfectants. The company serves agriculture, automotive, building and construction, contract cleaners, education, food and beverage, healthcare, hospitality, iron and metal, manufacturing, offices and public buildings, pharma, retail, and warehousing and logistics. It serves customers through a network of dealers and distributors, as well as through e-commerce sales. The company was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in BrÃ¸ndby, Denmark.

NLFSK.CO.summary: Nilfisk Holding A/S manufactures and sells cleaning solutions and services worldwide. The company operates through five segments: EMEA, Americas, APAC, Consumer, and Private Label and Other. It offers commercial and industrial vacuum cleaners; floor cleaning products, including single-disc, burnishers, carpet extractors, scrubber dryers, steam cleaners, sweepers, and combination machines; mobile, stationary, and petrol/diesel driven pressure washers; and industry, vehicle, floor care, surface, and textile detergents, as well as care and maintenance products, and disinfectants. The company serves agriculture, automotive, building and construction, contract cleaners, education, food and beverage, healthcare, hospitality, iron and metal, manufacturing, offices and public buildings, pharma, retail, and warehousing and logistics. It serves customers through a network of dealers and distributors, as well as through e-commerce sales. The company was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in BrÃ¸ndby, Denmark.

ODICO.CO.summary: Odico A/S manufactures formwork for the construction and wind turbine industries. It also provides consulting services, such as CAD-CAM integration, design guide and verification, parametric design and advanced modeling, project management, and project engineering services, as well as development of solutions for fabrication; and prototyping services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.

RBLN-B.CO.summary: Roblon A/S develops, produces, and sells coated and extruded fiber solutions primarily used in the fiber optic cable and energy sectors. It provides cable fibers, including glass strength members, polyester binder yarns, aramid strength members, ripcords, cable fillers, fiber reinforced plastics, and other products; and cable machinery, such as servers, binders, pay offs, precision winders, caterpillars, and quick adapters for the fiber cable industry. The company also offers offshore solutions comprising orbit straps, multi straps, flex straps, clamp straps, quick straps, ratchet straps, and single and double bolt tension devices; composite reinforcement tapes; composite fiber tapes for anti-bird caging; submarine reinforcement cables, strapping systems, safety nets, and reinforcement of thermoplastic pipes; and high-voltage pulling ropes and coated lines. It operates in Denmark, the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, Asia, Brazil, Italy, Latin America, and the United States. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Frederikshavn, Denmark.

SKAKO.CO.summary: SKAKO A/S designs, develops, and sells concrete batching plants and vibratory equipment in North America, Europe, Africa, and internationally. It operates through SKAKO Concrete and SKAKO Vibration segments. The company offers admix materials, including synthetic fibers, powder pigment metering, steel fiber proportioning, and polyprophylene fibers; cleaning systems; concrete mixers comprising Atlantis and Rotoconix; CONFLEX bucket conveyors; consistency controls; control systems; and Distribeton overhead gantry products, as well as concrete plant solutions. It also provides vibratory feeders, washing drums, grizzly and storage feeders, lift tippers, packaging and weigh systems, hydraulic and gear tippers, heat treatment products, on-off systems, heavy and medium duty screens, densimetric tables, flip flows, electroplating systems, and sorting and inspection systems. In addition, the company provides spare parts and after-sales services. SKAKO A/S was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Faaborg, Denmark.

VWDRY.summary: Vestas Wind Systems A/S designs, manufactures, installs, and services wind turbines worldwide. The company operates in two segments, Power Solutions and Service. The Power Solutions segment sells wind power plants, wind turbines, development sites, etc. The Service segment engages in the sale of service contracts, spare parts, and related activities. Vestas Wind Systems A/S was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Aarhus, Denmark.

VWS.CO.summary: Vestas Wind Systems A/S designs, manufactures, installs, and services wind turbines worldwide. The company operates in two segments, Power Solutions and Service. The Power Solutions segment sells wind power plants, wind turbines, development sites, etc. The Service segment engages in the sale of service contracts, spare parts, and related activities. Vestas Wind Systems A/S was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Aarhus, Denmark.
